TIA.name: TIA
TIA.description: The younger sister, cute and curious. She’s not your typical mercenary and seems more innocent than dangerous.

EVA.name: EVA
EVA.description: The older sister, foulmouthed and aggressive. She’s fiercely protective of her sister and has a sharp, cynical outlook on life.

BOSS.name: VEIL [HOLO CALL]
BOSS.description: Your corporate boss, always direct and cold. He’s the one who issued your assignment to eliminate the sisters.

RUNNER.name: KANE [HOLO CALL]
RUNNER.description: A male runner who assists you via holo-call. Calm and resourceful, he provides crucial information during missions.

storyDialogue.text: Coordinates locked in. You’re getting close, but something’s off… Keep your eyes sharp.
Visual’s glitching… Runner, do you copy?
[From the shadows] You shouldn’t have come here, Corp dog.
Let him. Corporate trash like him don’t deserve a quick end.
Eva, he’s passed out. We should do something, right?
Tie him up. We’re not playing nice with corporate assassins.
Oh, you’re awake! I thought you'd sleep longer... after what we did. I’m Tia, by the way!
Tia, don’t get friendly with him. He’s dangerous. We should’ve flatlined him already.
Corporate goons like him have one purpose—getting rid of us. Stop acting like he’s your pet.
But he doesn’t *seem* bad… I want to know why he came after us.
This isn’t a negotiation, Tia. You know how this ends.
Just one question... What’s your name? And why are you really here?
